name: Ext_R4_ServiceRequest_reasonCode
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ServiceRequest.reasonCode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.reasonCode from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: An explanation or justification for why this service is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in `supportingInfo`.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Diagnosis or problem codes justifying the reason for requesting the service investigation.
